mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ky_product_sku (sku_code, sku_name, product_id, spec_value_ids, sale_price, stock, weight, distri_type, distri_ratio, distri_amount, deleted) VALUES (#{productSku.skuCode}, #{productSku.skuName}, #{productSku.productId}, #{productSku.specValueIds}, #{productSku.salePrice}, #{productSku.stock}, #{productSku.weight}, #{productSku.distriType}, #{productSku.distriRatio}, #{productSku.distriAmount}, #{productSku.deleted})
